title: Unholy Intent
description: Monsters don’t often look like monsters on the outside. Married to a man I should hate, I’m now bound to Damian.I sometimes wonder what he sees when he looks at me.Deer in headlights, I guess.What I see is clear. Darkness.Desire.Want.A man with too much experience.The day he took me he told me I belong to him. And I believe him when he says he’ll keep me safe because he won’t let anyone touch what’s his.But I can’t forget what he is. Can’t forget the things he’s done.And no matter what, I can’t let myself fall in love with him.
author: Natasha Knight
